lead_paragraph: Teenager Heba Allejji, Syria's first Olympic table-tennis player, says she wants to show that the sport is alive and well in her country despite the civil war that is driving many fellow players abroad.

headline.print_headline: Syria's First Table Tennis Olympian Looking Beyond Rio
headline.main: Syria's First Table Tennis Olympian Looking Beyond Rio

snippet: Teenager Heba Allejji, Syria's first Olympic table-tennis player, says she wants to show that the sport is alive and well in her country despite the civil war that is driving many fellow players abroad....
